name: Monster Valley
description:
In Monster Valley you are a mayor in a village that focuses on using monsters as companions and friends. Your job is to collect and take care as many monsters as possible, while also trying to get enough money to take care your village.

Controls:

WASD to move.

E to interact.

Tab to open fast travel menu.

Esc to open pause menu.

Space to fill motivation bar during fights.

This game was made for a university project in the span of 18 days.
